name: Nursery Crhymes: The Case of The Three Bears
name_original: Nursery Crhymes: The Case of The Three Bears
description:
Nursery Crhymes: The Case of The Three Bears is an early prototype for a story driven game, retelling the classic Robert Southey story "The Three Bears" (sometimes known as "Goldilocks and The Three Bears"). 

As the lead detective, you explore the crime scene and encounter fun characters as you conduct your investigation. Your plucky sidekick, Const. Hopkins, does all the talking for you.
